name: Super Paper Spider
description:
CLICK THE GREEN FLAG TO START/RESTART THE PROJECT

SUPER PAPER SPIDER

INSTRUCTIONS

Intructions are in game.

(Forgot to add this in the Instructions: don't fall of the Web!)

CREDITS

Game and art by @RKI3000

Game Engine Used: Scratch

Music "Troubling Mischief" by HeatleyBros:

INFO

Made for the Mini Jam 123: Web

The theme of this game jam was "Web" and the limitation "There is no Ground"

The game fits the theme because it's themed around webs and spiders and it fits the imitation because you are not on the ground, you are suspended in the air on your web and you can fall off of it.

Art was drawn on paper,scanned, (painfully) adjusted in the scratch costume editor and used in-game.

Have Fun!

Thanks for checking out my entry!
